field.name: summary
field.value: SaveCopyAndFlush() method in ActiveRecordMediator.cs returns null, but should return object

field.name: description
field.value: The SaveCopyAndFlush() method in ActiveRecordMediator.cs has a return type of null. However, the XML comments for the method shows that it should return an object, and it calls ActiveRecordBase.SaveCopyAndFlush(), which returns an object. Therefore, ActiveRecordMediator.SaveCopyAndFlush() should return an object as well.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: Fixed in the repository in commit 2db139cd93e4f96888a50568f6a8d69bbe84e633.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
